metadata.name: Kruit's Tale #1
metadata.description: 1000 Kruit's Tale, manual reveal on the 23th one may chose to reveal his kruit or keep his map for guidance. Kruit's Tale, is a new take on the deckbuilding roguelike genre in the blockchain. Use your characters to clear dungeons, then upgrade your deck with new cards and perks to press forward. The fate of the world is in your hands degens.
